Page.ScreenName: Cash History End Of Period Listing
Page.Table:
PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter (T)ype, (S)ummary or (D)etail DropDown PPDField01 1 3 R Enter a valid option H T,S,D TYPE,SUMMARY,DETAIL
Enter Checks Type R,A,C,H,V or (ALL) DropDown PPDField02 1 3 R (R)egular, (A)uto, (C)ash, (H)and, (V)oid or (ALL) H R,A,C,H,V,ALL R,A,C,H,V,ALL
Enter Vendor No. or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 8 R Enter a valid vendor # or (ALL)
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
Enter Level: 0-Acct,1-Div,2-Dept,3-Cctr DropDown PPDField05 3 3 R Level 0-Account, 1-Division, 2-Department, 3-Cost Center H 0,1,2,3 0,1,2,3
Enter Period (YYYYPP) Text PPDField06 3 6 R Enter a valid period (ex. 200201)
